name: Chucksaw
description:
Chucksaw is a stupid-simple, but blazingly fast  party game in which you throw saws at your friends while avoiding saws thrown at you!

That's what you do with saws, right?

In Chucksaw you can:

  • Throw  saws by flicking or charging
  • Catch incoming saws
  • Deflect saws by dashing into them

All with one button!

Tips:

  • Don't charge a saw too long
  • You can dash across pits in the ground
  • You can also dash into other players ;)

Other info:

Chucksaw requires controllers in order to be played and locally supports 2-4 players.

Chucksaw doesn't have any music, so I recommend you to bust out your best bops while playing. Personally I recommend the Just Shapes & Beats OST.
